side_projects.title: Interactive Rating
side_projects.description: Interactive Rating Component. Built with Typescript, React, and TailwindCSS.

side_projects.title: Stats Preview
side_projects.description: Business Stats Preview Card Component. Built with Typescript, React, and TailwindCSS.

side_projects.title: Results Summary
side_projects.description: Summary Component for a results page. Built with Typescript, React, and TailwindCSS.

side_projects.title: This Portfolio
side_projects.description: This is it! I'll add a blog later, but for now, it's just a place to put my projects and test different libraries.

side_projects.title: Vue Todos
side_projects.description: Todo App with Vue. Only saving data to local storage here, but we could easily drop in a database. CRUD operations are all here.

side_projects.title: Vanilla JS Simon Says
side_projects.description: Simon says watch your volume. Familiarizing array methods in vanilla JS. Beats making a calculator.

side_projects.title: Vanilla JS Drum Kit
side_projects.description: A drum kit made with vanilla JS. I really do take frameworks for granted sometimes. Especially event listeners.

projects.title: ChatGPT Clone
projects.description: Took an opportunity to play with the OpenAI API. It's all the buzz afterall, right? I used Next and Firebase to provide a real-time chat layer. OAuth keeps the sessions unique for every user. I had a lot of fun with this. I highly recommend checking the API docs out. Temperature is set to 1 here ðŸ¤ª

projects.title: The Local Weather
projects.description: A simple Weather App that uses the OpenWeatherMap API to display the current weather for a given location. My first actual project using Vue JS. I really wish more companies adopted Vue, it's a great framework. I really see myself using it more in the future.
